questions.question: Considering the overall layout and key arrangement, what is the dominant type of this input device?

Examining the keyboard's design, is its form factor typically described as full-size or compact?
Focusing on the key tops, what is the discernible text imprinted onto each keycap for user input?
Looking closely at the upper right corner, what brand name is subtly visible on the keyboard's casing?
Considering the keyboard's structure, what is the primary orientation of this input peripheral intended for desktop use?
Based on the visible features, what is the type of connection interface implied by the keyboard's design (wired/wireless)?
Analyzing the surface of the keys, what textural quality do they mostly present (smooth/rough/textured)?
Considering the arrangement of keys, what distinct section is located towards the right side of the main typing area?
Observing the keyboard's frame, what geometric shape best defines its overall external profile?

Considering the keyboard's components, what is the primary mechanism used for actuation of each key?
